p: SR, SPM, SJL and GSK designed the study protocol. SR performed the in vitro experiments, analyzed statistical data, wrote and revised the manuscript. SR, SMK, HJL, VVGS, SEH and EHK performed the in vivo experiment. SJL and JDH performed the in vivo rat tissue experiment. SMK performed the experimental analysis and manuscript revision. SPM performed the GC/MS analysis and compound identification. GSK provided advise for the experimental analysis.
